title: The Science of Happiness
description:
What does science have to say about happiness? As Yale’s Dr. Laurie Santos discovered… quite a lot. In this episode of our Hunt for Happiness series, Dr. Santos shares the secrets of a scientifically happier life. 

Follow Dr. Laurie Santos on Twitter: @lauriesantos

Sign up for The Science of Well-Being for free on Coursera

Listen to The Happiness Lab podcast: http://podcasts.pushkin.fm/dailysmile
